name: Cangjie-helper-for-android
tagline: A simple cangjie input code finder
body:
### Cangjie Helper for Android
Cangjie Helper is an open sourced simple Android application used to find the canjie input code of Chinese Characters.

### Legal
Cangjie Helper for Android is built using open source software:  
* [Android SQLiteAssetHelper](https://github.com/jgilfelt/android-sqlite-asset-helper)
